question: 西側
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>West</kanji> <kanji>side</kanji> of something is known as the <vocabulary>West</vocabulary> or the <vocabulary>West side</vocabulary>. Sorry, I have no story to go along with your West side.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings are the kun'yomi vocab readings. You should know both of them, with <ja>西</ja> being <ja>にし</ja> and <ja>側</ja> being <ja>がわ</ja> (what you learned with the kanji).
